函数式编程的例子 Supporting tagline

google题目

T(0) = T(1) = 1;

T(2) = 2;

T(N) = T(N-1) + T(N-2) + T(N-3);

  • 代码最少的lisp实现
 1 	(defun fact1-google (min mid max count max-count)
 2 	  (case max-count
 3 		(0 1)
 4 		(1 1)
 5 		(2 2)
 6 		(t (if (> count max-count)
 7 		   max
 8 		   (fact1-google mid max (+ min mid max) (1+ count) max-count)))))
 9 
10 	(defun fact-google (n)
11 	  (fact1-google 1 1 2 3 n))
  • 学习SICP之前的解题1
 1 public class Test {
 2 	private static int iMax;//T(n-1)  max
 3 	private static int iMid;//T(n-2)  mid
 4 	private static int iLast;//T(n-3)  last
 5 	
 6 	public static int fn(int n){
 7 		if(n < 3){
 8 			return ((0==n || 1==n) ? 1 : 2);
 9 		}else{
10 			init();
11 			int times = (int) Math.rint(n/3);
12 				
13 			while(0 != times){
14 				//T(n-3) = T(n-4) + T(n-5) + T(n-6)
15 				iLast = iMax + iMid + iLast;
16 				//T(n-2) = T(n-4) + T(n-5) + T(n-3)
17 				iMid = iMax + iMid + iLast;
18 				//T(n-1) = T(n-4) + T(n-2) + T(n-3)
19 				iMax = iMax + iMid + iLast;
20 				times--;
21 			}
22 				
23 			int result = -1;
24 			if(0 == n % 3) result = iLast;
25 			if(1 == n % 3) result = iMid;
26 			if(2 == n % 3) result = iMax;
27 			
28 			return result;
29 		}
30 	}
31         
32 	public static void init(){
33 		iMax = 2;
34 		iMid = 1;
35 		iLast = 1;
36 	}
37 
38 }
  • 学习SICP之后
 1 	public static int fact_google(int n){
 2 			return fact1_google(1, 1, 2, 3, n);
 3 	}
 4 	
 5 	private static int fact1_google(int min, int mid, int max,
 6 int count, int maxCount)
 7 	{
 8 		if(1 == maxCount || 0 == maxCount){
 9 			return 1;
10 		}
11 		if(2 == maxCount){
12 			return 2;
13 		}
14 			
15 		if(count > maxCount) return max;
16 		else return fact1_google(mid, max, min+mid+max,	++count, maxCount);
17 	}
